items.name: Akeneo
items.description: Akeneo offers a product information management (PIM) solution that helps businesses manage and enrich product data.

items.name: Bluestone PIM
items.description: Bluestone PIM provides a cloud-native PIM solution that supports efficient product data management and distribution.

items.name: inriver
items.description: inriver offers a PIM solution that helps businesses centralize and manage product information for enhanced e-commerce operations.

items.name: Salsify
items.description: Salsify provides a PIM platform that supports product content management and syndication across multiple channels.

items.name: Pimberly
items.description: Pimberly offers a cloud-based PIM solution that helps businesses manage and enrich product data effectively.
